content: During the quarter, we purchased MSRs with $23 billion in UPB at excellent prices, demonstrating that we continue to maintain a very disciplined bidding strategy focused on portfolios with quality collateral and attractive yields that we're confident will help us drive higher return on equity. In the long-term, we see significant growth opportunity in sub-servicing and to help maximize that potential, we've recently appointed one of our most experienced executives, Bryan Budd to Head our entire Sub-Servicing business, Bryan's charges to grow our portfolio with the best clients and to do that by ensuring that our best-in-class service gets even better.
